AI Description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytic computing, designed to scale from single machines to large clusters. It provides advanced parallelism for analytics, enabling performance at scale for the tools you love.
Core Features: Parallel Computing, Scalability, Efficient Task Scheduling, Integration With Existing Libraries Like Numpy, Pandas, & Scikit-Learn
General Tags: Parallel Computing, Scalable Computing, Analytics, Data Science
